# Balance (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Fharlanghn]], [[Obad-Hai]] |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Grumbar, Oghma, Ubtao, Waukeen |

**Granted Powers:** Once per day, as a free action, you can add your Wisdom modifier to your Armor Class. This bonus lasts for 1 round per cleric level.

**BalanceDomain Spells**

**1** **[[Make Whole (Spell)|Make Whole]]****:** Repairs an object.

**2** **[[Calm Emotions (Spell)|Calm Emotions]]****:** Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

**3** **[[Clarity of Mind (Spell)|Clarity of Mind]]****:** +4 bonus on saves against mind-affecting spells and abilities, allows reroll of concealment miss chance.

**4** **[[Dismissal (Spell)|Dismissal]]****:** Forces a creature to return to native plane.

**5** **[[Sanctuary, Mass (Spell)|Sanctuary, Mass]]****:** One creature/level can’t be attacked, and can’t attack.

**6** **[[Banishment (Spell)|Banishment]]****:** Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

**7** **[[Word of Balance (Spell)|Word of Balance]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or nauseates nonneutral creatures.

**8** **[[Protection From Spells (Spell)|Protection from Spells]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Confers +8 resistance bonus.

**9 [[Weighed in the Balance (Spell)|Weighed in the Balance]]:** Harms or heals creatures within 30 feet of you.
